00054 OmniDrivePositionController::OmniDrivePositionController(double positionGainTranslation,
00055         double velocityGainTranslation,
00056         double positionGainRotation,
00057         double velocityGainRotation,
00058         double positionToleranceTranslation,
00059         double velocityToleranceTranslation,
00060         double positionToleranceRotation,
00061         double velocityToleranceRotation) {
00062 
00063     actualTime = 0;
00064     timeOffset = 0;
00065 
00066 
00067 
00068     tolerance = Odometry(Pose2D(positionToleranceTranslation,
00069             positionToleranceTranslation,
00070             positionToleranceRotation),
00071             Twist2D(velocityToleranceTranslation,
00072             velocityToleranceTranslation,
00073             velocityToleranceRotation));
00074 
00075     gains = Odometry(Pose2D(positionGainTranslation,
00076             positionGainTranslation,
00077             positionGainRotation),
00078             Twist2D(velocityGainTranslation,
00079             velocityGainTranslation,
00080             velocityGainRotation));
00081 
00082     resetFlags();
00083 
00084 }
00085 
00086 OmniDrivePositionController::OmniDrivePositionController() {
00087     actualTime = 0;
00088     timeOffset = 0;
00089     tolerance = Odometry(Pose2D(0.1, 0.1, 0.05));
00090 
00091     resetFlags();
00092 }

00094 OmniDrivePositionController::OmniDrivePositionController(const OmniDrivePositionController& orig) :
00095 targetTrajectory(targetTrajectory) {
00096 
00097     actualTime = 0;
00098     timeOffset = 0;
00099     tolerance = orig.getTolerance();
00100 
00101     targetOdometry = orig.getTargetOdometry();
00102     translationFlag = orig.translationFlag;
00103     rotationFlag = orig.rotationFlag;
00104 
00105 }

00109 }

00111 void OmniDrivePositionController::resetFlags() {
00112     translationFlag = false;
00113     rotationFlag = false;
00114 }

00124 void OmniDrivePositionController::setTargetTrajectory(const TrajectoryWithId& trajectory) {
00125     resetFlags();
00126 
00127     targetTrajectory.setTrajectory(trajectory.getTrajectory());
00128     targetTrajectory.id = trajectory.id;
00129 
00130 }

00133     return targetTrajectory;

00135 
00136 bool OmniDrivePositionController::isTargetReached() const {
00137 
00138     return translationFlag && rotationFlag;
00139 }
00140 
00141 void OmniDrivePositionController::targetReached(bool& translation, bool& rotation) {
00142 
00143     KDL::Trajectory* trajectoryComposite = targetTrajectory.getTrajectory();
00144 
00145     double duration = trajectoryComposite->Duration();
00146     KDL::Frame frame = trajectoryComposite->Pos(duration);
00147 
00148     double roll, pitch, yaw;
00149     frame.M.GetRPY(roll, pitch, yaw);
00150 
00151     Pose2D desiredPose(frame.p.x(), frame.p.y(), yaw);
00152     Pose2D actualPose = actualOdometry.getPose2D();
00153 
00154     double angDist = getShortestAngle(desiredPose.getTheta(), actualPose.getTheta());
00155     double linDist = getDistance(desiredPose, actualPose);
00156 
00157     translation = false;
00158     rotation = false;
00159 
00160     if (linDist <= tolerance.getPose2D().getX() && linDist <= tolerance.getPose2D().getY()) {
00161         translation = true;
00162     }
00163 
00164     if (fabs(angDist) <= tolerance.getPose2D().getTheta()) {
00165         rotation = true;
00166     }
00167 }
00168 
00169 const Odometry& OmniDrivePositionController::computeNewOdometry(const Odometry& actualOdometry, double elapsedTimeInSec) {
00170 
00171 
00172     KDL::Trajectory* trajectoryComposite = targetTrajectory.getTrajectory();
00173 
00174     this->actualOdometry = actualOdometry;
00175     computedOdometry = Odometry();
00176 
00177     if (trajectoryComposite != NULL && trajectoryComposite->Duration() > 0 && !isTargetReached()) {
00178   
00179         actualTime = elapsedTimeInSec + timeOffset;
00180 
00181         KDL::Frame desiredPose = trajectoryComposite->Pos(actualTime);
00182         KDL::Twist desiredTwist = trajectoryComposite->Vel(actualTime);
00183         KDL::Frame initPose = trajectoryComposite->Pos(0);
00184 
00185         double r, p, y;
00186         desiredPose.M.GetRPY(r, p, y);
00187 
00188         Odometry desiredOdometryGlobal(Pose2D(desiredPose.p.x(),
00189                 desiredPose.p.y(),
00190                 actualOdometry.getPose2D().getTheta()),
00191                 Twist2D(desiredTwist.vel.x(),
00192                 desiredTwist.vel.y(),
00193                 desiredTwist.rot.z()));
00194 
00195         Odometry desiredOdometryLocal;
00196 
00197         Odometry actualOdometryGlobal(actualOdometry);
00198         Odometry actualOdometryLocal;
00199 
00200         OmniDriveKinematicsModel omnidrive;
00201         omnidrive.convertToLocalReferenceFrame(desiredOdometryGlobal, desiredOdometryLocal);
00202         omnidrive.convertToLocalReferenceFrame(actualOdometryGlobal, actualOdometryLocal);
00203 
00204         double dPosX = desiredOdometryLocal.getPose2D().getX();
00205         double dPosY = desiredOdometryLocal.getPose2D().getY();
00206         double dPosTheta = y; //desiredOdometryLocal.getPose2D().getTheta();
00207 
00208         double dVelX = desiredOdometryLocal.getTwist2D().getX();
00209         double dVelY = desiredOdometryLocal.getTwist2D().getY();
00210         double dVelTheta = desiredOdometryLocal.getTwist2D().getTheta();
00211 
00212         double aPosX = actualOdometryLocal.getPose2D().getX();
00213         double aPosY = actualOdometryLocal.getPose2D().getY();
00214         double aPosTheta = actualOdometryLocal.getPose2D().getTheta();
00215 
00216         double positionXError = dPosX - aPosX;
00217         double positionYError = dPosY - aPosY;
00218         double positionThetaError = getShortestAngle(dPosTheta, aPosTheta);
00219 
00220         double gainPosX = gains.getPose2D().getX();
00221         double gainPosY = gains.getPose2D().getY();
00222         double gainPosTheta = gains.getPose2D().getTheta();
00223 
00224         double gainVelX = gains.getTwist2D().getX();
00225         double gainVelY = gains.getTwist2D().getY();
00226         double gainVelTheta = gains.getTwist2D().getTheta();
00227 
00228         double errorTheta = gainVelTheta * dVelTheta + gainPosTheta * positionThetaError;
00229         double errorX = gainVelX * dVelX + gainPosX * positionXError;
00230         double errorY = gainVelY * dVelY + gainPosY * positionYError;
00231 
00232         computedOdometry.setTwist2D(Twist2D(errorX, errorY, errorTheta));
00233     }
00234 
00235     return computedOdometry;
00236 }
00237 
00238 float OmniDrivePositionController::getShortestAngle(float goalAngle, float actualAngle) {
00239     return atan2(sin(goalAngle - actualAngle), cos(goalAngle - actualAngle));
00240 }
00241 
00242 float OmniDrivePositionController::getDistance(const Pose2D& actualPose, const Pose2D& goalPose) {
00243     return sqrt((actualPose.getX() - goalPose.getX()) * (actualPose.getX() - goalPose.getX()) +
00244             (actualPose.getY() - goalPose.getY()) * (actualPose.getY() - goalPose.getY()));
00245 }
00246 
00247 void OmniDrivePositionController::setTolerance(const Odometry& tolerance) {
00248     this->tolerance = tolerance;
00249 }
00250 
00251 const Odometry& OmniDrivePositionController::getTolerance() const {
00252     
00253     return tolerance;
00254 }
